objects.name: Analytic 0718
objects.description: Forged web credentials may manifest as anomalous SAML token issuance, OpenID Connect token minting, or Zimbra pre-auth key usage. Defenders may see tokens issued without normal authentication events, multiple valid tokens generated simultaneously, or signing anomalies in IdP logs.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: azure:signinlogs
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: SAML/OIDC tokens issued without corresponding MFA or password validation

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Connections
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Pre-authentication keys generated or token signing anomalies

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Limit the maximum time temporary tokens are valid.
Define normal authentication flows (e.g., password+MFA) to baseline token issuance.
